nodes.text: Lilva Nervi was the wife of Imperial Captain Ralchio Nervi. The two were married shortly before the latter attended the Rengali Imperial Naval Academy. A social climber, Ralchio Sargan took her name, and her lobbying helped get him a promotion under Moff Ravik. It was rumored that the officer kept mistresses, however.
Lila Nervi is mentioned in Fantasy Flight Games's roleplaying game adventure Friends Like These.
